meanings.definition: A person who performs rap music.
meanings.sent1: Many rappers write their own lyrics.
meanings.sent2: The concert featured famous rappers from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The rappers at the talent show impressed the audience with their skills.
meanings.sent4: The rappers' words painted vivid pictures of their experiences.
meanings.sent5: The young rapper's energy on stage was contagious.

meanings.definition: A device used for wrapping or sealing items.
meanings.sent1: She used the rappers to wrap the gift neatly.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen had various sizes of rappers for food storage.
meanings.sent3: The rappers made the task of wrapping presents much easier.
meanings.sent4: The rappers securely sealed the package for shipping.
meanings.sent5: The colorful rappers added a festive touch to the package.
